虎: (ko/tora) - tiger , tiger (Panthera tigris); drunkard, drunk, sot
虎に翼: (とらにつばさ) - making the strong even stronger
虎の威を借る狐: (とらのいをかるきつね) - person who swaggers about under borrowed authority; small man acting arrogantly through borrowed authority; a fox that borrows the authority of a tiger

虎の尾を踏む: (とらのおをふむ) - to take great risks

虎を野に放つ: (とらをやにはなつ) - to let loose a tiger in the field; to let loose something dangerous

虎穴に入らずんば虎児を得ず: (こけつにいらずんばこじをえず) - nothing ventured, nothing gained
虎穴に入らずんば虎子を得ず: (こけつにいらずんばこしをえず) - nothing ventured, nothing gained

虐待: (gyakutai) - abuso, maus-tratos, maltratação, tratamento inadequado, crueldade
虔み深い: (つつしみぶかい) - discreet; modest; cautious
虔む: (つつしむ) - (usu. 慎む) to be careful/to be discreet; (usu. 慎む) to do in moderation/to refrain (from overdoing)/to abstain; (謹む only) to be reverent; to be purified/to be chaste
虚々実々: (きょきょじつじつ) - (yoji) full of wiles and tricks; match between persons equal in shrewdness mobilizing all the tricks each can muster; shrewdly avoiding the opponent's strong points and attacking its weaknesses
虚々実々の戦い: (きょきょじつじつのたたかい) - match between persons equal in shrewdness

虚しくなる: (むなしくなる) - to die; to expire
